program main

    implicit none

    character(len=1000) :: input_str, output_str
    integer :: uppercase =0, lowercase=0
    integer :: pointer=0, count=0, i
    character(len=1), dimension(1000) :: stack
    character(len=1) :: ch, char1, char2

    ! Read input

children.label: bug_fixing

children.text:
Decide case and convert
    if (uppercase > lowercase) then
        ! Convert to uppercase do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
            ch = input_str(i:i) if (ch >= 'a' .and. ch <= 'z') then
                output_str(i:i) = achar(ichar(ch) - 32)
            else
                output_str(i:i) = ch
            end if
        end do
    else
        ! Convert to lowercase do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
            ch = input_str(i:i) if (ch >= 'A' .and. ch <= 'Z') then
                output_str(i:i) = achar(ichar(ch) + 32)
            else
                output_str(i:i) = ch
            end if
        end do
    end if

    ! Process second part: stack and count
    pointer =0
    count =0
    do i = 1, len_trim(output_str)
        ch = output_str(i:i)
        pointer = pointer +1
        stack(pointer) = ch
        do
            if (pointer <2) exit
            char1 = stack(pointer)
            char2 = stack(pointer-1)
            if ( (char1 == '0' .and. char2 == '1') .or. (char1 == '1' .and. char2 == '0') ) then
                count = count +1
                pointer = pointer -2
            else
                exit
            end if
        end do
    end do

    !

Putting all together in a program:

program main

    implicit none

    character(len=1000) :: input_str, output_str
    integer :: uppercase =0, lowercase=0
    integer :: pointer=0, count=0
    character(len=1), dimension(1000) :: stack

    ! Read input
    read(*, '(A)') input_str

    ! Process first part: count uppercase and lowercase
    do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
        ch = input_str(i:i)
        if (ch >= 'A' .and. ch <= 'Z') then
            uppercase = uppercase +1
        else if (ch >= 'a' .and. ch <= 'z') then
            lowercase = lowercase +1
        end if
    end do

    ! Decide case and convert
    if (uppercase > lowercase) then
        ! Convert to uppercase
        do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
            ch = input_str(i:i)
            if (ch >= 'a' .and. ch <= 'z') then
                output_str(i:i) = achar(ichar(ch) - 32)
            else
                output_str(i:i) = ch
            end if
        end do
    else
        ! Convert to lowercase
        do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
            ch = input_str(i:i)
            if (ch >= 'A' .and. ch <= 'Z') then
                output_str(i:i) = achar(ichar(ch) + 32)
            else
                output_str(i:i) = ch
            end if
        end do
    end if

    ! Process second part: stack and count
    pointer =0
    count =0
    do i = 1, len_trim(output_str)
        ch = output_str(i:i)
        pointer = pointer +1
        stack(pointer) = ch
        do
            if (pointer <2) exit
            char1 = stack(pointer)
            char2 = stack(pointer-1)
            if ( (char1 == '0' .and. char2 == '1') .or. (char1 == '1' .and. char2 == '0') ) then
                count = count +1
                pointer = pointer -2
            else
                exit
            end if
        end do
    end do

    ! Output the result
    print *, count *2

end program main
